name: SMART-25: Sustainable Multidisciplinary Artificial Intelligence Research for Global Transformations - 2025
hosting: Department of Humanities and Social Sciences
venue: North Eastern Regional Institute of Science and Technology
deemedUniversity: Deemed-to-be University under the Ministry of Education, Government of India
description: Join SMART-25 on November 14-15, 2025, at NERIST, to explore accelerating SDGs through AI.
